about_the_game:
The male and female custom equipments, 6 set each, will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode."

* Added Equipment
・Animal Set (male)
・Court Official Set (male)
・Leather Armor Set　(male&female)
・Scale Armor Set (male&female)
・Military Officer Set　(male)
・Civil Servant Set (male)
・Athletic Set (female)
・Flower Princess Set (female)
・Vermillion Armor Set (female)
・Divine Priestess Set (female)

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
detailed_description:
The male and female custom equipments, 6 set each, will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode."

* Added Equipment
・Animal Set (male)
・Court Official Set (male)
・Leather Armor Set　(male&female)
・Scale Armor Set (male&female)
・Military Officer Set　(male)
・Civil Servant Set (male)
・Athletic Set (female)
・Flower Princess Set (female)
・Vermillion Armor Set (female)
・Divine Priestess Set (female)

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over　※No 4K compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
